DataElement.preferredName: History Alcoholic Beverage Five Or More Nearly Daily Use Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates whether there was ever a time or times in a person's life when they drank 5 or more drinks of any kind of alcoholic beverage almost every day.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: History Alcoholic Beverage Five Or More Nearly Daily Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events._A drink, including beer, wine or liquor, that is made by fermentation of raw materials. An alcoholic beverage contains ethanol (alcohol) as the active ingredient._A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Greater in size, amount, extent, or degree._Not quite or just short of._Occurring or done each day._A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events.:A drink, including beer, wine or liquor, that is made by fermentation of raw materials. An alcoholic beverage contains ethanol (alcohol) as the active ingredient.

Concepts.definition: The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events.
A drink, including beer, wine or liquor, that is made by fermentation of raw materials. An alcoholic beverage contains ethanol (alcohol) as the active ingredient.

Property.preferredName: Five Or More Nearly Daily Use
Property.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Greater in size, amount, extent, or degree.:Not quite or just short of.:Occurring or done each day.:A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Greater in size, amount, extent, or degree.
Not quite or just short of.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Response to a question about lifetime alcohol consumption.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The answer is not known by the person answering.

Concepts.definition: The answer is not known by the person answering.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

Concepts.definition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Was there ever a time or time
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was there ever a time or times in your life when you drank 5 or more drinks of any kind of alcoholic beverage almost every day?
